00019 #ifndef _IQ_ADAPTER_HPP_cm121126_
00020 #define _IQ_ADAPTER_HPP_cm121126_
00021 
00022 #include "processor.hpp"
00023 #include "network/protocol.hpp"
00024 #include "network/client/service_net.hpp"
00025 #include "wave/reader.hpp"
00026 
00027 namespace network {
00028 
00029   // adapter
00030   template<typename PROCESSOR>
00031   class iq_adapter : public processor::base {
00032     // for integer I/Q samples
00033     typedef union {
00034       struct __attribute__((__packed__)) {
00035         boost::int32_t i;
00036         boost::int32_t q;
00037       } iq;
00038       struct __attribute__((__packed__)) {
00039         boost::uint8_t i1,i2,i3,i4;
00040         boost::uint8_t q1,q2,q3,q4;
00041       } samples;
00042     } iq_sample;
00043 
00044     typedef std::vector<std::complex<double> > complex_vector_type;
00045 
00046   public:
00047     typedef boost::shared_ptr<iq_adapter > sptr;
00048 
00049     iq_adapter(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00050       : base(config)
00051       , p_(config) {}
00052   
00053     virtual ~iq_adapter() {}
00054   
00055     virtual void process(service::sptr sp,
00056                          const_iterator begin,
00057                          const_iterator end) {
00058       const bool is_iq (std::string(sp->id(), 0, 2) == "IQ");
00059       const bool is_wav(std::string(sp->id(), 0, 3) == "WAV");
00060       if (not is_iq && not is_wav)
00061         return;
00062 
00063       protocol::iq_info header_iq;
00064       bcopy(begin, &header_iq, sizeof(protocol::iq_info));
00065       begin += sizeof(protocol::iq_info);
00066 
00067       const size_t bytes_per_sample(header_iq.bytes_per_sample());
00068       const size_t n_samples(std::distance(begin, end) / (2*bytes_per_sample));
00069       assert((std::distance(begin, end) % (2*bytes_per_sample)) == 0);
00070       if (iqs_.size() != n_samples)
00071         iqs_.resize(n_samples);
00072 
00073       if (header_iq.sample_type() == 'I') {
00074         if (is_iq  && bytes_per_sample == 3) {
00075           static double norm(1./static_cast<double>(1L << 31));
00076           size_t counter(0);
00077           for (const_iterator i(begin); i!=end;) {
00078             iq_sample s;
00079             s.samples.i1 = 0; s.samples.i2 = *i++; s.samples.i3 = *i++; s.samples.i4 = *i++;
00080             s.samples.q1 = 0; s.samples.q2 = *i++; s.samples.q3 = *i++; s.samples.q4 = *i++;
00081             const std::complex<double> cs(s.iq.q*norm,
00082                                           s.iq.i*norm);
00083             iqs_[counter++] = cs;
00084           }
00085         } else if (is_wav) {
00086           size_t counter(0);
00087           for (const_iterator i(begin); i!=end;) {
00088             const std::pair<const_iterator, double> xi(wave::detail::read_real_sample(i, 8*bytes_per_sample));
00089             i = xi.first;
00090             const std::pair<const_iterator, double> xq(wave::detail::read_real_sample(i, 8*bytes_per_sample));
00091             i = xq.first;
00092             iqs_[counter++] = std::complex<double>(xi.second, xq.second);
00093           }
00094         }
00095 
00096         // make up service object
00097         network::client::service_net_iq::sptr snp(network::client::service_net_iq::make(sp, header_iq));
00098 
00099         // call processor
00100         p_.process_iq(snp, iqs_.begin(), iqs_.end());
00101       } else {
00102         // complain
00103       }
00104     }
00105   protected:
00106 
00107   private:
00108     PROCESSOR p_;
00109     complex_vector_type iqs_;
00110   } ;
00111 
00112 } // namespace network
00113 #endif // _IQ_ADAPTER_HPP_cm121126_
